text: @djcozmik The ultimate decision on whether to leave a package or not is up to the driver. Their goal is to leave it in a secure area, away from public view and inclement weather. Please DM the tracking number, so we can check on your shipment. ^EL https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ

@UPSHelp Yeah… I would think that inside my locked apartment building, where I signed to have them leave it, and where my wife was home to sign for it would be just fine for any driver….

I’ll DM you the tracking info
